participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: wise and nurturing, with a strong love for family and a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: i have amazing children and grandchildren. i had cancer but its gone now. i do not have a smartphone. i am retired and living the great life.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: ambitious and introspective, often lost in thought but eager to improve and achieve his dreams.
participant_2.background: my family is continuously growing. i'm married to a doctor. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.
